languages.text: {n}С минуту вокс-линия хрипит помехами, а затем хмельной грубый голос врывается в эфир:{/n} "Ваш Вашество, неужто и правда сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец фон, Трон {mf|его|ее} побери, Валанциус! Нижайше бью челом. Не сочтите за грубость — наш конвой лишь дань уважение вашей святейшей персоне. Вы бы и говорить с нами не стали, не пощекочи мы вашим офицерам нервишки, правда?"

traits.locale_text: {n}С минуту вокс-линия хрипит помехами, а затем хмельной грубый голос врывается в эфир:{/n} "Ваш Вашество, неужто и правда сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец фон, Трон {mf|его|ее} побери, Валанциус! Нижайше бью челом, Благородие. Не сочтите за грубость — наш конвой лишь дань уважение вашей вятейшей персоне. Вы бы и говорить с нами не стали, не пощекочи мы вашим офицерам нервишки, правда?"

languages.text: {n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"
languages.original_text: {n}С минуту вокс-линия хрипит помехами, а затем хмельной грубый голос врывается в эфир:{/n} "Ваш Вашество, неужто и правда сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец фон, Трон {mf|его|ее} побери, Валанциус! Нижайше бью челом. Не сочтите за грубость — наш конвой лишь дань уважение вашей святейшей персоне. Вы бы и говорить с нами не стали, не пощекочи мы вашим офицерам нервишки, правда?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

{n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

{n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

{n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

languages.text: {n}一分钟之后，音阵频道发出了噼里啪啦的静电声。随后，一个醉醺醺的粗犷声音响了起来。{/n}“好了，我来了。这不是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的大人嘛！黄金王座在上，这他妈可是如假包换的行商浪人啊！我向你致意，{mf|大人|女士}，我们绝无冒犯之意。我们的舰队只是打算向你这个圣人致敬。要不是我们把你们的军官吓得够呛，恐怕你也不会停下来和我们聊聊，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一分钟之后，音阵频道发出了噼里啪啦的静电声。随后，一个醉醺醺的粗犷声音响了起来。{/n}“好了，我来了。这不是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的大人嘛！黄金王座在上，这他妈可是如假包换的行商浪人啊！我向你致意，{mf|大人|女士}，我们绝无冒犯之意。我们的舰队只是打算向你这个圣人致敬。要不是我们把你们的军官吓得够呛，恐怕你也不会停下来和我们聊聊，你说呢？”

languages.text: {n}En un minuto, la línea de voco restalla con estática, seguida de una voz ronca y ebria:{/n} «Vaya, vaya, ¡pero si es mi{mf|lord|lady} {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, que el Trono {mf|le|la} condene! Me quito humildemente el gorro ante usted, mi señoría. No queremos ofender; nuestro grupito no es más que una condecoración para su santísima persona. Seguro que no se habría parado a hablar con nosotros si no hubiéramos asustado a sus oficiales, ¿a que no?».
languages.original_text: {n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

traits.locale_text: {n}En un minuto, la línea de voco restalla con estática, seguida de una voz ronca y ebria:{/n} «Vaya, vaya, ¡pero si es mi{mf|lord|lady} {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, que el Trono {mf|le|la} condene! Me quito humildemente el gorro ante usted, mi señoría. No queremos ofender; nuestro grupito no es más que una condecoración para su santísima persona. Seguro que no se habría parado a hablar con nosotros si no hubiéramos asustado a sus oficiales, ¿a que no?».

languages.text: {n}1分後、ヴォクス回線から雑音が響くと、荒々しい酔っぱらいの声が聞こえ始める。{/n}「こりゃ驚いた。自由開拓者のフォン・呪いの王座・ヴァランシウス陛下のお出ましか！謹んで敬意を払いますよ、{mf|陛下|お嬢}様。攻撃の意図はない…この艦隊は聖なる自由開拓者に対する尊敬の証ってだけだ。話をやめるつもりはなかったんだろ、お前の部下が大層怖い目にあったとしてもさ、なあ？」
languages.original_text: {n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

traits.locale_text: {n}1分後、ヴォクス回線から雑音が響くと、荒々しい酔っぱらいの声が聞こえ始める。{/n}「こりゃ驚いた。自由開拓者のフォン・呪いの王座・ヴァランシウス陛下のお出ましか！謹んで敬意を払いますよ、{mf|陛下|お嬢}様。攻撃の意図はない…この艦隊は聖なる自由開拓者に対する尊敬の証ってだけだ。話をやめるつもりはなかったんだろ、お前の部下が大層怖い目にあったとしてもさ、なあ？」

languages.text: {n}Une minute plus tard, la ligne se met à grésiller, puis une voix rauque et saoule se fait entendre :{/n} « Eh ben ça alors ! Sa Seigneurité {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius ! Je vous tire humblement mon chapeau bas, {mf|mon bon monsieur|ma petite dame}. On voulait pas vous froisser avec notre convoi, c'est juste une marque de respect pour votre sainteté. Avouez, vous vous seriez jamais {mf|arrêté|arrêtée} pour nous parler si on avait pas flanqué une belle frousse à vos officiers, pas vrai ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une minute plus tard, la ligne se met à grésiller, puis une voix rauque et saoule se fait entendre :{/n} « Eh ben ça alors ! Sa Seigneurité {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius ! Je vous tire humblement mon chapeau bas, {mf|mon bon monsieur|ma petite dame}. On voulait pas vous froisser avec notre convoi, c'est juste une marque de respect pour votre sainteté. Avouez, vous vous seriez jamais {mf|arrêté|arrêtée} pour nous parler si on avait pas flanqué une belle frousse à vos officiers, pas vrai ? »

languages.text: {n}Eine Minute später knistert Rauschen in der Vox-Leitung, gefolgt von einer rauen, betrunkenen Stimme:{/n} "Da hol mich doch ...! Es ist {mf|Seine Lordheit, Freihändler|Ihre Ladyheit, Freihändlerin} von – der Thron sei verdammt – Valancius! Ich ziehe in Demut meine Stirnlocke vor Euch, {mf|mein Herr|werte Dame}. Wir wollen Euch nicht beleidigen – unser Konvoi ist lediglich eine Respektsbezeugung für Eure heilige Person. Ihr hättet doch sicher kein Wort mit uns gewechselt, wenn wir Euren Offizieren nicht ordentlich Angst gemacht hätten, stimmt's?"
languages.original_text: {n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Minute später knistert Rauschen in der Vox-Leitung, gefolgt von einer rauen, betrunkenen Stimme:{/n} "Da hol mich doch ...! Es ist {mf|Seine Lordheit, Freihändler|Ihre Ladyheit, Freihändlerin} von – der Thron sei verdammt – Valancius! Ich ziehe in Demut meine Stirnlocke vor Euch, {mf|mein Herr|werte Dame}. Wir wollen Euch nicht beleidigen – unser Konvoi ist lediglich eine Respektsbezeugung für Eure heilige Person. Ihr hättet doch sicher kein Wort mit uns gewechselt, wenn wir Euren Offizieren nicht ordentlich Angst gemacht hätten, stimmt's?"

languages.text: {n}Voks hattı, bir dakika sonra parazitlenmeyle tekrar dile geliyor ve ardından kaba ve sarhoş bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Vay anam vay. Hür Tacir {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius Hazretleri değil mi bu? Taht canımı ala! {mf|Beyim|Hanımım}, huzurunuzda eğiliyorum. Kötü bir niyetimiz yoktur. Aksine konvoyumuz, yüce şahsınızın saygınlığının bir nişanesidir. Subaylarınızı birazcık korkutmasaydık şimdi bizimle konuşuyor olmazdınız, öyle ya?"
languages.original_text: {n}A minute later, the vox-line crackles with static, followed by a rough, drunken voice:{/n} "Well, I'll be. It's {mf|His Lordliness|Her Ladyness} Rogue Trader von — Throne-damned — Valancius! I humbly tug m'forelock to you, {mf|m'lud|m'lady}. We mean no offence — our convoy is but a mark of respect for your holy self. You wouldn't have stopped to talk to us, would you, if we hadn't given your officers a good scare, eh?"
